description: Anger + frustration combined with powerlessness and hopelessness (despair/low hope present).
actor_description: My hands clench and unclench like it could matter. It doesn't. Every path collapses into the same wall, and the anger has nowhere to go—no action that changes anything, no outcome that isn't already decided.
description_text: {actor}'s fists tighten and release in small, useless cycles. Their shoulders hitch with a sharp breath, eyes flicking for an exit that isn't there—anger curdling into something more desperate as the options run out.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear a strained, ragged exhale and the faint stutter of something being tapped or struck—impatience with nowhere to land.
